regen.absent_element: driver confirmation during automatic transfer to Shunting
regen.new_specification: The system shall require and confirm driver acceptance when automatically transferring to Shunting at speeds equal to or lower than the supervised shunting speed.

regen.absent_element: driver confirmation for automatic transfer to Shunting
regen.new_specification: The system shall require confirmation from the driver before automatically transferring to Shunting at speeds equal to or lower than the supervised shunting speed.

regen.absent_element: Driver confirmation during automatic transfer to Shunting
regen.new_specification: Automatic transfer to Shunting will occur only after receiving confirmation from the driver at speeds equal to or lower than the supervised shunting speed.

label: Before authomatic transition to Shunting, ETCS shall request confirmation from the driver.
absence: confirmation from the driver if authomatic transition to Shunting
